Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.DecisionMaker

  • Packages that use DecisionMaker 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning
    Top-level package for machine-learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.

    • Uses of DecisionMaker in com.joliciel.talismane.parser

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.parser with parameters of type DecisionMaker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NonDeterministicParser ParserService.getTransitionBasedParser(DecisionMaker decisionMaker, TransitionSystem transitionSystem, Set<ParseConfigurationFeature<?>> parseFeatures, int beamWidth)
      A non-deterministic parser implementing transition based parsing, using a Shift-Reduce algorithm.
      See Nivre 2008 for details on the algorithm for the deterministic case.
      NonDeterministicParser ParserServiceImpl.getTransitionBasedParser(DecisionMaker decisionMaker, TransitionSystem transitionSystem, Set<ParseConfigurationFeature<?>> parseFeatures, int beamWidth)

    • Uses of DecisionMaker in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns with parameters of type DecisionMaker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tokeniser TokeniserPatternService.getCompoundPatternTokeniser(TokeniserPatternManager patternManager, Set<TokenPatternMatchFeature<?>> features, DecisionMaker decisionMaker, int beamWidth)
      The compound pattern tokeniser first splits the text into individual tokens based on a list of separators, each of which is assigned a default value for that separator.
      Tokeniser TokeniserPatternService.getIntervalPatternTokeniser(TokeniserPatternManager patternManager, Set<TokeniserContextFeature<?>> features, DecisionMaker decisionMaker, int beamWidth)
      The interval pattern tokeniser first splits the text into individual tokens based on a list of separators, each of which is assigned a default value for that separator.
